plot: Daughter of a slave and a white man, Isaura lived in a farm, in Campos do Goitacazes, in the state or Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, being treated as a daughter by Ester, her owner, but as a slave...
plot_en: Daughter of a slave and a white man, Isaura lived in a farm, in Campos do Goitacazes, in the state or Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, being treated as a daughter by Ester, her owner, but as a slave...

title: La esclava Isaura
